summary: Completed comprehensive testing of RallyDesk new features including Google OAuth, Public Board, Competition Detail, Match Scoreboard, Control Desk, Standings, and Player CSV Import. Fixed critical backend bug (missing Response import) and all 16 backend tests passed. All 11 frontend UI tests passed.

critical.issue: FIXED - Missing Response import in server.py caused NameError and server crash

issues: Standings show 'No standings available yet' when no matches completed - expected behavior, UI is good
Shows 'No completed matches yet' - expected behavior for fresh tournament

critical_code_review_comments: Fixed missing 'Response' import from fastapi in server.py - this was causing the backend to crash
Google OAuth endpoint /api/auth/google/session exists and properly validates session_id
Public Board endpoint /api/tournaments/{id}/public-board returns correct data structure
Control Desk endpoint returns resources, pending_matches, live_matches, and recent_completed data
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for robust testing
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_ prefixed players and competitions during testing. Existing data: Tournament ID f8eb0a09-6bc3-4735-8a57-55bb48a5c836 with 7 players, 5 resources, 2 competitions. Competition ID 8eedfa49-8fbd-4b2a-a82f-3e4380a7a75a has 4 participants and 3 matches (single elimination bracket).
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features tested and working: Google OAuth session endpoint, Public Board, Competition Detail (bracket/participants/matches tabs), Match Scoreboard with scoring buttons, Control Desk with resources/match queue, Standings page, Player CSV Import. Backend tests in test_rallydesk_new_features.py. Fixed critical bug: missing Response import in server.py. Tournament has live match (Player 1 vs Player 3) in Men's Singles Table Tennis competition.

frontend_tests: Test 1: Login page with Google Login button - PASSED
Test 2: Login with Admin credentials - PASSED
Test 3: Tournament Detail page (Control Desk, Standings, Public Board buttons) - PASSED
Test 4: Competition Detail page (Bracket, Participants, Matches tabs) - PASSED
Test 7: Match Scoreboard page with scoring buttons - PASSED
Test 8: Control Desk page with resources and match queue - PASSED
Test 11: Player Import page with CSV template download - PASSED

bug_fix_applied.fix: Added 'Response' to fastapi imports: from fastapi import FastAPI, APIRouter, HTTPException, Depends, status, UploadFile, File, Query, Response
bug_fix_applied.rca: The google_session endpoint (line 405) was using 'Response' type hint for the response parameter, but Response was not imported from fastapi. This caused the server to crash on startup.
